data.title: Luxury Boutique Accommodation in Bondi
data.meta_description: Boutique guesthouse in Bondi Beach offering unique luxury accommodation at affordable prices. Book your beachside stay now.
data.text:
Great location within walking distance of Bondi local shopping, Bondi Junction train station and the famous Bondi Beach

Here for a short holiday or a longer stay, the Baxley is the perfect choice for a beachside getaway

Beautifully curated design and thoughtful guest amenities to make sure you have a comfortable and peaceful stay

Variety of room options from single, double and queen rooms with shared bathroom to premium queen with private ensuite

Premium linen, luxurious locally-sourced botanical amenities, communal lounge, kitchenette and laundry facilities

The Macleay Groupâ€™s unique signature boutique accommodation concept delivers affordable luxury at the famous Bondi Beach

Supporting an environment that promotes diversity and equality in partnership with local initiatives and community projects

Live like a local on a quiet leafy street close to Bondi Road. Only a short walk from eclectic Bondi local shopping precincts, Bondi Junction Train Station and the iconic Bondi Beach

Our friendly Guest Services team are available 7 days to create the perfect stay.

Contact us today with your enquiry!

Valid for stays of 7 or more nights, our Weekly Stay rates offer guests a discounted nightly rate when opting for longer visits. Simply select 7 nights availability in your checkout and stay!
